title: Johannis Tarnovii S.S. Theol. D. & in Academia Rostochiensi Professoris, In Prophetam Amos Commentarius
creator: Tarnovius, Johannes

source: Tarnovius, Johannes: Johannis Tarnovii S.S. Theol. D. & in Academia Rostochiensi Professoris, In Prophetam Amos Commentarius  In quo textus Analysi perspicua illustratur, Ex fonte Hebraeo explicatur, Locis S.S. parallelis confirmatur, a pravis expositionibus vindicatur, Usus vero in Locis Communibus ex ipsa scriptura natis & probatis indicatur ; Adiectus est in fine index verborum & rerum memorabilium.
